EmailTemplate.description: Web Despatch Parcel send login CSSO with credit claim
EmailTemplate.name: Web Despatch Parcel send login CSSO with credit claim
EmailTemplate.subject: We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
A business of Australia Post
We’re inviting you to use Parcel Send
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
We previously contacted you about making the switch from Web Despatch to Parcel Send and the replacement of ‘pre-paid’ services with post-paid services.
We’ve already set up your account, so you can log in to Parcel Send below using your existing Australia Post details to start sending.
After you’ve logged in to Parcel Send, you’ll still have access to Web Despatch to view Proof of Deliveries (PODs) and obtain pricing estimates until these features are available in Parcel Send.
Claiming credit for my excess ‘prepaid satchels’
If you have any excess satchels, please fill out this form so we can arrange a credit towards your post-paid services.
Once you’ve returned your form, you can start ordering more post-paid satchels using your existing StarTrack consumables website username and password. You can still use your excess satchels with a valid Fixed Price Premium label from Parcel Send.
Return the form by:
email at lodgementmigration@auspost.com.au fax on 03 9017 1212 or texting ‘claim’ to 0409 184 735 to either complete the form online or take a photo of your completed physical form and send it to us.
Log in
Forgot your password? Simply select Forgot Password and follow the prompts to reset your password.
Still have questions? If you’ve got any questions, please email our friendly support team at lodgementmigration@auspost.com.au or visit our website for more information on getting the most out of Parcel Send.
This email was sent by Australia Post. Australia Post does not represent, warrant or guarantee that the integrity of this email communication has been maintained nor that the communication is free of errors, viruses or interference.
Terms & conditions | Privacy policy
